Environmental sanitation:
. Clean and disinfect frequently touched sufaces in the quarantined person's
room (e.9. bed frames, tables etc.) daily with LoloSodium Hypochlorite
Solution.
. Clean and disinfect toilet surfaces daily with regular household bleach

Duration of home quarantine:
The home quarantine period is for 14 days from contact with a confirmed case or
